Wordpress

Content Management System

Wordpress is the best choice for classic content management using basic content types like posts and pages, categories and tags

10+ projects done since 2006

Jekyll

Site generator

Jekyll works with any content type making it ideal for storytelling. By lacking an administrative interface it is meant for developers only.

10+ projects done since 2009

DocPad

Site and stream generator

Docpad is like Jekyll extended with realtime publishing of content streams. By lacking an administrative interface it is meant for developers only.

1 project done since 2013

Craft

Storytelling

Craft can taylor content structure to any site's specific needs—essential for storytelling. It has a Wordpress-like administrative interface.

1 project done since 2014
